title: Caitlyn's headshots are really bullshitty.
body:
They're like an annie Q,  just direct damage,  it's boring.  Not to mention it encourages lethality,  and not crit like cait was supposed to like.

Add a little steroid to it,  where if caitlyn procs headshot,  she gets 3% of the damage the headshot deals as critical strike chance for 9 seconds,  stacking up to 3 times.
